name: docker-all-the-things
description: example project to dockerize all the things

scripts.start:dev: npm install && nodemon -x 'npm-run-all build start' --watch lib/src/ --ignore dist/ -L -e 'ts'
scripts.test:watch: npm install && nodemon -x 'npm-run-all test:unit' --watch lib/ --ignore dist/ -L -e 'ts'
scripts.build: echo building... && npm-run-all build:ts build:lint && echo done!
